variable.name: PE006B
variable.description: Result/location of abnormality - Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI)

variable.name: PE010
variable.description: Result (Prospective Investigation of Pulmonary Embolism Diagnosis (PIOPED) criteria) - ventilation/perfusion V/Q scan

variable.name: PE024
variable.description: Pulmonary embolus (PE) final diagnostic summary, source of embolus (SOE), Code=110
variable.value: Pulmonary embolis (PE) by pulmonary arteriogram, Computerized Tomography Pulmonary Angiography (CTPA) or Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI)

variable.name: PE025
variable.description: Pulmonary embolus (PE) final diagnostic summary: Source of embolism (SOE), Code=111
variable.comment: Only code if pulmonary arteriography not done
variable.value: Pulmonary embolis (PE) by history and high probability ventilation/perfusion (V/Q) scan

variable.name: PE026
variable.description: Pulmonary embolus (PE) final diagnostic summary: Source of embolism (SOE), Code=112
variable.value: Pulmonary embolis (PE) by clinical high suspicion and documented source of PE (DVT)

variable.name: PE027
variable.description: Pulmonary embolus (PE) final diagnostic summary: Source of embolism (SOE), Code=113

variable.name: PE031

variable.name: PE032

variable.name: PE033

variable.name: PE034
variable.description: Deep vein thrombosis (DVT) final diagnostic summary: Other DVT, Code=4
variable.value: Other deep vein thrombosis (DVT) - maybe DVT
